title: Course Title Here
description: Detailed description of what the course covers, learning objectives, and what students will achieve
_audience_note: Choose one or more from: Primary, Secondary, Professional, Business
_start_date_format: YYYY-MM-DD or text like 'Flexible' or 'Coming Soon'
_features_note: List key features and benefits of the course
_keywords_note: Add searchable keywords for the course
_prerequisites_note: Specify requirements or use 'None' if no prerequisites
_is_active_note: Set to true to make course available, false to hide it
_currently_enrolling_note: Set to true if accepting new enrollments
_display_note: Set to true to show on frontend, false to hide from public but keep in admin
_sort_order_note: Lower numbers appear first, use for ordering courses
_course_materials_note: Optional: Add course materials. Types can be: video, document, assignment, quiz, live_session
_schedule_note: Optional: Add schedule details for live sessions

_instructions.1: Fill in all fields without underscore prefix
_instructions.2: Fields with underscore prefix (like _note) are just for guidance - don't include them in final JSON
_instructions.3: Remove any optional sections you don't need
_instructions.4: Ensure audiences array contains valid values only
_instructions.5: Keep display=true to show course publicly, false to hide
_instructions.6: Save this as 'new_course.json' and share it for processing
